# sampling

Reservoir Sampling algorithm implementation.

```ruby
reservoir = Reservoir.new(100) # 100 elements capacity
0.upto(1_000_000) { reservoir.add(_1) } # 1M events stream
```

```ruby
puts reservoir.samples.sort.inspect # outputs 100 random samples
> [
>   1111, 3045, 9735, 10486, 19195, 22268, 23457, 24483, 27041, 35833,
>   43761, 48306, 50669, 62776, 63983, 66629, 72903, 75693, 77193, 82521,
>   86611, 106550, 119253, 120073, 131856, 143316, 147576, 151874, 153520, 160505,
>   166823, 187442, 217143, 232010, 284101, 289849, 292207, 301103, 306702, 306853,
>   361211, 364044, 395206, 414496, 434130, 442937, 461715, 485490, 496384, 501014,
>   501844, 504861, 508342, 508780, 525437, 527992, 534555, 536447, 538217, 548663,
>   562029, 581072, 584223, 585881, 587573, 596706, 600938, 604545, 606559, 626966,
>   638272, 644229, 651795, 656924, 658114, 660655, 665733, 674201, 717521, 757637,
>   779764, 798590, 801042, 812899, 816969, 830024, 833039, 840367, 846703, 856784,
>   867287, 871210, 894385, 916348, 916866, 923751, 937983, 953926, 956258, 999559,
> ]
```
